title: Malarae Mounamaa Lyrics Karnaa
stanzas:
paadhi jeevan kondu
dhaegam vazhndhu vandhadho
meedhi jeevan unnai
partha podhu vandhadho

kanavu kandu endhan
kangal moodi kidandhaen
kaatru pola vandhu
kangal mella thirandhaen

uravae uravae uyirin uyirae
pudhu vaazhkai thandha vallale
